sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <template>
      <v-card tile>
        <v-container>
          <v-form>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="blue darken-2"
                        >store</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      90
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Product</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="green darken-2"
                        >shopping_cart</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      80
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Order</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="blue darken-2"
                        >mdi-account</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      70
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Customer</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="purple darken-2"
                        >mdi-account-multiple</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      60
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Supplier</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="12">
                <v-card>
                  <v-container fluid>
                    <v-row align="center">
                      <v-col cols="8">
                        <v-card-title>Income Chart</v-card-title>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="4">
                        <v-select class="selector" v-model="selectIncome">
                        </v-select>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="12">
                        <line-chart :data="dummyData"></line-chart>
                      </v-col>
                    </v-row>
                  </v-container>
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="12">
                <v-card>
                  <v-container fluid>
                    <v-row align="center">
                      <v-col cols="6">
                        <v-card-title>Outcome Chart</v-card-title>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="6">
                        <v-select class="selector" v-model="selectOutcome">
                        </v-select>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="12">
                        <line-chart :data="dummyData"></line-chart>
                      </v-col>
                    </v-row>
                  </v-container>
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-form>
        </v-container>
      </v-card>
    </template>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      dummyData: [
        ["Jan", 4],
        ["Feb", 2],
        ["Mar", 5],
        ["Apr", 4],
        ["Mei", 6],
        ["Jun", 4],
        ["Jul", 2],
        ["Ags", 5],
        ["Sep", 4],
        ["Okt", 6],
        ["Nov", 4],
        ["Des", 6],
      ],
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.selector {
  width: 100px;
}
</style>
